title: What is the full meaning of Punjabi's song 'Jatt Da Blood' in English? - Quora

People use it when they talk about the dna of any jatt person. Jatts are considered very hardworking and macho .. that's why when they witness any jatt boy or girl doing aggressive things then they say thay they are the blood of jatt that's why it's in their genes
